name: pw2en

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

comment: The power set of a set is equinumerous to set exponentiation with a base of ordinal 2. Proposition 10.44 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 96. This is Metamath 100 proof #52. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2015.)
